name: Jungle Jangle
description:
What is Jungle Jangle?

Jungle Jangle is a hide-and-seek tag multiplayer game. Seekers look for the hiders, using the compass tool when needed. Both teams gather resources to craft traps and weapons.

The game allows up to 10 players to join a server, either by LAN or by using the provided server executable.

Title screen and background: Background vector created by pikisuperstar - www.freepik.com
